description:
Sales Consultant

We are looking for energetic, self motivating team members with excellent communication skills, strong teamwork abilities, and a desire to grow and advance within the company.

This is a full time position. Sales staff works a 5 day work week, Saturdays are required. You will have a day off during the week.

Primary responsibilities focus on new and used sales of vehicles and customer service.
• Qualified hires will have the opportunity to qualify for a company demo
• All hires qualify for weekly and monthly bonuses
• There is also earnings paid by the auto manufacture for bonuses

This position is a high demand and fast paced position. Sales Consultants are the front face of providing service to consumers in the market for a new or used vehicle. Being highly organized and having a strong ability to work well independently, as well as in a team environment will ensure success at this level.

Automotive experience is preferred but not required, and it does open the door for higher compensation with added responsibility and opportunity for advancement. Understanding customer and retail basics is critical. This is an excellent position for individuals that have previous experience working in a retail industry.

Applicants can apply in person at location, or can send an email through Indeed. Ask for Chris Seabolt, Brent Guthrie or Paul Aaron.

Job Type: Full-time

Pay: $25,000.00 - $250,000.00 per year

Benefits:
• 401(k)
• Company car
• Dental insurance
• Employee discount
• Flexible schedule
• Health insurance
• Health savings account
• Life insurance
• Paid time off
• Paid training
• Vision insurance

Compensation package:
• Bonus opportunities
• Commission pay
• Monthly bonus
• Uncapped commission

Schedule:
• Weekends as needed

Travel requirement:
• No travel

License/Certification:
• Driver's License (Required)

Work Location: In person
